title: What causes Obesity in Kiribati
summary: This chart shows the factors which Cause Obesity in Kiribati and the percentage of their contribution .

Fast_Food account for just under 25 percentage of Obesity , followed by Lack_of_Exercise of which accounts for 35 percentage of Obesity , but genetics is the highest contributing factor accounting for 40.1 percentage of the Cause of Obesity .
gold: This chart indicates three possible causes of obesity in the Kiribati population . It indicates the main cause of obesity was attributed to genetic cause with 40 % of the sample identifying that as the main reason . Only 25 % indicated fast food contributed to the problem .
